stories.Title: SREday in London
stories.Description: Keep September 14th-15th free for SREday in London! Join us for a two-day event filled with over 50+ talks, perfect for networking with fellow tech enthusiasts. Secure your early bird tickets today!
stories.Tweet: SREday in London 📦 Keep September 14th-15th free for SREday in London! Join us for a two-day event filled with over 50+ talks, perfect for networking with fellow tech enthusiasts. Secure your early bird tickets today! #SRE https://sreday.com/?unpack

stories.Title: Llama 2 vs. GPT-4
stories.Description: This document pits two giants in a battle with one task to achieve: factual accuracy. Llama-2-70b's victory highlights it as a promising alternative to conventional closed LLMs.
stories.Tweet: Llama 2 vs. GPT-4 📦 This document pits two giants in a battle with one task to achieve: factual accuracy. Llama-2-70b's victory highlights it as a promising alternative to conventional closed LLMs. #llama2 https://www.anyscale.com/blog/llama-2-is-about-as-factually-accurate-as-gpt-4-for-summaries-and-is-30x-cheaper

stories.Title: Redefining realities with 3D
stories.Description: Taken directly from Reddit, this remarkable footage showcases how a drone, LumaAI, and Unreal Engine merge to sculpt a 3D concept: depicting how a coastal town would appear with rising sea levels.
stories.Tweet: Redefining realities with 3D 📦 Taken directly from Reddit, this remarkable footage showcases how a drone, LumaAI, and Unreal Engine merge to sculpt a 3D concept: depicting how a coastal town would appear with rising sea levels. #3Dmodeling https://twitter.com/gravicle/status/1696592902976417998?s=48&t=Q5TRDQAMIO4T7eVqAyEwHA

stories.Title: Walmart announces “My Assistant”
stories.Description: The US retail giant takes a step into the future of work, where companies utilize AI to enhance productivity by assisting employees with repetitive tasks like summarizing and content creation.
stories.Tweet: Walmart announces “My Assistant” 📦 The US retail giant takes a step into the future of work, where companies utilize AI to enhance productivity by assisting employees with repetitive tasks like summarizing and content creation. #ai https://www.axios.com/2023/08/30/walmart-generative-ai-app

stories.Title: It's OpenAI's world, we just live in it
stories.Description: Defying bankruptcy rumors and surpassing projections, OpenAI is on track to achieve an impressive $1 billion in revenue over the next year. Undoubtedly, they're at the forefront of the AI revolution.
stories.Tweet: It's OpenAI's world, we just live in it 📦 Defying bankruptcy rumors and surpassing projections, OpenAI is on track to achieve an impressive $1 billion in revenue over the next year. Undoubtedly, they're at the forefront of the AI revolution. #openai https://www.techtimes.com/articles/295726/20230830/chatgpt-maker-openai-set-surpass-1-billion-next-12-months.htm

stories.Title: Intel unveils “Sierra Forest”
stories.Description: Intel's latest chip aims to double efficiency for the same power consumption. With a 240% performance boost per watt, it aligns with the growing trend to make tech more sustainable.
stories.Tweet: Intel unveils “Sierra Forest” 📦 Intel's latest chip aims to double efficiency for the same power consumption. With a 240% performance boost per watt, it aligns with the growing trend to make tech more sustainable. #intel https://interestingengineering.com/innovation/intel-double-power-chip

stories.Title: Google and Nvidia's joint innovation
stories.Description: As announced at Google's Next 2023 event, the A3 GPU supercomputer is set to step into the spotlight next month, fusing Nvidia's power and Google's IPUs.
stories.Tweet: Google and Nvidia's joint innovation 📦 As announced at Google's Next 2023 event, the A3 GPU supercomputer is set to step into the spotlight next month, fusing Nvidia's power and Google's IPUs. #google https://techcrunch.com/2023/08/29/googles-new-a3-gpu-supercomputer-with-nvidia-h100-gpus-will-be-generally-available-next-month/

stories.Title: Get ready for: Wonderlust
stories.Description: Clear your schedule for September 12, because invitations to the highly anticipated Apple event of the year have arrived. The question arises: Are all the iPhone 15 rumors becoming reality?

stories.Title: The Pixel 8 sneak peek
stories.Description: As October approaches, anticipation for the Pixel 8 and its Pro variant builds. Leaked images have kept enthusiasts engaged, and Google has inadvertently shared one.

stories.Title: More bumps on Ariane 6's road
stories.Description: ESA continues to encounter hurdles on its journey into space. This time, a scheduled fire test for Ariane 6's core stage has been delayed due to ground equipment issues.
stories.Tweet: More bumps on Ariane 6's road 📦 ESA continues to encounter hurdles on its journey into space. This time, a scheduled fire test for Ariane 6's core stage has been delayed due to ground equipment issues. #ESA https://spacenews.com/esa-postpones-ariane-6-hot-fire-test-again/

stories.Title: Everybody loves Rust
stories.Description: Rust continues its reign as the most hyped programming language. With 80% of developers expressing their intention to use it again, learn all about its journey and the factors that make it stand out.
stories.Tweet: Everybody loves Rust 📦 Rust continues its reign as the most hyped programming language. With 80% of developers expressing their intention to use it again, learn all about its journey and the factors that make it stand out. #programming https://github.blog/2023-08-30-why-rust-is-the-most-admired-language-among-developers/

title: Llama 2 takes the lead, OpenAI's billion path, Apple's approaching event
description: Meta's beloved open-source model continues to defy expectations. Chances are, it could match up with humans in terms of accuracy. Heard about OpenAI's bankruptcy rumors? Turns out, there's a billion-dollar reason those were just lies. Last but not least, Apple has officially announced the iPhone 15 event. My wallet's feeling a mix of fear and excitement.
